content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.5, 13.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Electric pole (position 12.5, 13.5)
-  Electric pole (position 15.5, 15.5)
-  Electric pole (position 11.5, 13.5)
-  Electric pole (position 20.5, 10.5)
-  Electric pole (position 9.5, 13.5)
-  Electric pole (position 10.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(2.0, 2.0)

### Copper cable factory at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Assembling machine (position 5.5, 0.5) and inserter (position 5.5, 0.5) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position 5.5, 0.5) that connects the furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) to the assembling machine at position(5.5, 0.5)

### Lab at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Lab (position 5.5, 0.5)

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory to smelt in the furnaces. Check the status of each furnace and replenish the required materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities in the target position.
